abstract: Chosen by Speaker Nancy Pelosi, the seven Democratic lawmakers reflect the geographic and demographic diversity of the partyâ€™s caucus.
lead_paragraph: One was an Army Ranger. Another, a police chief. Still another, a corporate lawyer. Together, seven House Democrats will serve as managers of the impeachment trial in the Senate and press the case that President Trump abused the power of his office and obstructed Congress.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
